snippet: Although 2013 was a wetter than average year for the contiguous 48 states, scientists said, that statistic masked sharp regional differences.
abstract: Government scientists say that drought condition in California and elsewhere in the Far West intensified in 2013, adding to concerns about water supplies in the region.
lead_paragraph: Although 2013 was a wetter than average year for the contiguous 48 states, scientists said, that statistic masked sharp regional differences.

headline.main: Far West Got Drier Last Year, Data Shows
headline.print_headline: Far West Got Drier Last Year, Data Shows
